message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $75.
I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I think the product is worth more than $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $82.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking $77.50 is a fair price for me.
I'm not willing to go as low as $77.50, Bob. But I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $81.50. It's the highest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $79, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'd like to buy the product for $79.
I'm not willing to sell it to you for $79, Bob. I think it's worth more than that. I'll meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm willing to sell it to you for $81. It's the best I can do.
